name: Gamebar Autodeafen
description: Mutes GameBar at a %. Full controls in Geode.

Enabled by Default.description:
Enable the mod automatically on each level load.

IMPORTANT: If this setting is DISABLED, the mod will NOT load in the pause menu.

Enabled in StartPos.description: Allow autodeafen when using a start position.

Deafen Percent.description: Percent at which to mute. 0 = disabled.

Undeafen Percent.description: Percent at which to unmute again.
